projects.title: CCVS - Comprehensive Code Verification System
projects.description: A comprehensive system for code verification and analysis. Collaborative project focused on improving code quality and security through automated verification.
projects.author: Laween Al-Sulaivany, Judah Nava, Donovan Morse, Ben Johnson, James Zook, Ugnius Bieliunas

projects.title: Voice-Controlled LLM Assistant
projects.description: An intelligent voice-controlled assistant powered by Large Language Models. Features hands-free interaction and natural language processing for seamless user experience.
projects.author: Laween Al-Sulaivany, Dyson Mois

projects.title: Beating Dark Souls III with Reinforcement Learning
projects.description: Training an AI agent to defeat Iudex Gundyr in Dark Souls III using reinforcement learning techniques. Explores game AI and deep learning in challenging environments.
projects.author: Laween Al-Sulaivany, Zach Moore, Ben Johnson, Maxwell Sheridan, Shadrak Kumi

projects.title: Notes Summarizer
projects.description: Automatically summarize lecture notes and study materials using natural language processing. Helps students quickly review and understand key concepts from lengthy documents.
projects.author: Joshua Fadase

projects.title: splongleOS
projects.description: A custom operating system built from scratch. Explores low-level system programming, kernel development, and operating system architecture.
projects.author: Ben Johnson

projects.title: TinyNetUse
projects.description: Lightweight network utility tool for monitoring and analyzing network traffic. Designed for simplicity and efficiency in network diagnostics.
projects.author: Laween Al-Sulaivany

projects.title: reqwatcher
projects.description: Monitor and track HTTP requests in real-time. Useful for debugging web applications, API testing, and understanding network behavior.
projects.author: Laween Al-Sulaivany

projects.title: Sudoku Solver
projects.description: Efficient sudoku puzzle solver using advanced algorithms. Features backtracking and constraint propagation for fast puzzle resolution.
projects.author: Laween Al-Sulaivany
